summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3182, for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from Henderson Street to 47th Avenue South at Morgan Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39144 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
